additional_requirement: Focus on ethical concerns and regulatory compliance.
Include scenarios involving the misuse of authority.
Focus on historical and recent significant events.
Discuss implications for businesses and individuals outside EU.
Emphasize on handling and storage practices.
Discuss potential risks and management strategies.
Cover disaster preparedness and response strategies.
Discuss the impact on privacy and freedom of expression.
Include types of abuse and prevention measures.
Focus on industrial and laboratory environments.
